entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
